item.title: Looking for SQL objects and data
item.description: When working with Dynamics GP and SQL Server, finding a specific table, stored procedure, table column, or data value is often necessary. This is especially true when troubleshooting issues with third-party modules where the table name or database location is unknown. Several methods exist for searching SQL Server for a specific object. One straightforward approach uses the INFORMATION_SCHEMA views. These views are helpful when the object type (table, stored procedure, etc.
